word: "MARRIAGE MARKS AN IMPORTANT ERA IN THE LIVES OF MEN. 'WHOSO FINDETH A WIFE FINDETH A GOOD THING, AND OBTAINETH FAVOUR OF THE LORD,' IS THE LANGUAGE OF WISDOM. PROVERBS 18:22. . . . WE WERE MARRIED AUGUST 30, 1846, AND FROM THAT HOUR UNTO THE PRESENT SHE HAS BEEN MY CROWN OF REJOICING."--LS 125, 126 (1880).
